actions.recommendation: Prostate specific antigen testing: annually, from age 40
From age 50 annual bone density screen for osteoporosis and colonoscopy for colon cancer is recommended
Abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems.
Avoid excessive alcohol consumption to reduce the risk of liver disease and other health problems.
Maintain a healthy diet to support overall well-being and prevent chronic diseases.
Regular exercise is essential for maintaining a healthy weight, reducing the risk of chronic diseases, and improving mental health.
Avoid smoking to reduce the risk of lung cancer, heart disease, and other health problems.
Maintain a healthy sleep schedule to support overall well-being and prevent chronic diseases.
Regular stress management techniques, such as meditation or yoga, can help improve mental health and reduce the risk of chronic diseases.
Regularly check blood pressure, cholesterol levels, and blood sugar levels to monitor overall health.
Maintain good oral hygiene to prevent dental problems and reduce the risk of heart disease.
Regularly check vision and hearing to monitor overall health.
No vitamins or supplements explicitly recommended
